teacher_info.intro: I am a professional Japanese/English teacher. Let's work together to achieve your goals and improve your abilities. Looking forward to your lesson request!
teacher_info.introduction:
Обучение английскому и японскому языкам с нуля или среднего, продвинутого уровня. Помощь в выполнении домашнего задания, подготовка к экзаменам, в том числе международным. Изучение языка для туризма или по работе.

Среди учеников есть поступившие в вуз, успешно сдавшие международные экзамены, прошедшие собеседование при устройстве на работу, а также assessment interview при повышении по службе.

Меня зовут Петр и я живу в г. Гродно (Беларусь). Русский - мой родной язык, но я с радостью обучу Вас японскому или английскому! Я выпустился из Военного университета МО РФ в г. Москве. Занимаюсь репетиторством и преподаю японский  и английский языки с 2005 года как для детей, так и для взрослых. Как правило, я составляю учебный план совместными усилиями с учеником в зависимости от Ваших целей и предполагаемых сроков обучения. Обычно ученый план достаточно гибкий и может быть легко изменен в соответствии с Вашими пожеланиями и возможностями. Я провожу занятия на русском и английском языках. Будьте готовы к интересному и познавательному чтению на наших занятиях. Запланируйте урок - позанимаемся!

I’m Peter from Grodno city in Belarus. Russian is my native language and I’ll be glad to teach you Japanese and English. I’ve graduated from Military University of Russian Ministry of Defence in Moscow and have great experience (since 2005) as Japanese and English instructor both for kids and adults. Study plan is usually generated by joint efforts of teacher and student depending on your goals and time availability. Remember that plan is very flexible and can be changed anytime due to your abilities and requests. Teaching is available in English and Russian. I’m very fond of books so be prepared for easy and useful reading during our lessons. Looking forward to your lesson request!

teacher_info.intro: ✅  Both fun and knowledgeable. Enthusiastic about both the language and the student. Quick and patient.  Professional and informal at the same time. Try a lesson with me.🔥
teacher_info.short_signature: I have brought many from Zero to Fluency. Working with long-term students!
teacher_info.introduction:
My teaching methods are flexible and I can help students in many ways.

1) Structured Lessons 0-A2 ( Beginners )

Pronunciation +listening +grammar +vocabulary+reading.

I use the communicative approach, but with beginners, I work through the basics meticulously. I present the material according to the communicative need, but with carefully dosed portions. 


2) Interactive Russian B1-C1 ( Intermediate - Advanced level)

The main purpose of these lessons is to bring you out of your silent stagnation, give you confidence and fluency. These lessons are also for self- learners, whom I greatly respect, who would like to activate their passive knowledge through the meaningful use of the language

You will practice specific grammar points in an engaging and natural way through conversational patterns and games. 
I will arrange a great variety of interactive and task-based lessons where I try to make you speak spontaneously 

3) Speaking practice A2- C1(Elementary- Advanced)

I will adjust the pace and difficulty to your level and lead the conversation according to your needs and interests in a way that we repeat new words and structures as much as possible. You will receive quality feedback and just enough amount of grammar comments.

4) Informal tutoring
Informal tutoring in its full sense is a student-led session.
I truly believe in the power of Autodidacticism (ok!ok! self - education)
But to practice the language and get a professional feedback you need ME ;)

Here I expect Low - Intermediate - Advanced experienced students with their own material 

•	come with your story to tell
•	come with your questions
•	come to role-play your upcoming interview or event
•	come to practice your speech
•	come to the lesson with your textbook​ to check your exercise	 
AND get a competent professional feedback
teacher_info.about_me: ✅  Both fun and knowledgeable. Enthusiastic about both the language and the student. Quick and patient.  Professional and informal at the same time. Try a lesson with me.🔥

I am very flexible and quickly adapt to your level and style of learning. I love explaining nuances of the Russian language and teaching Russian perception of the world through the language.

course_info.trial_description: You are welcome to have a trial lesson with me. Please, write about yourself, your experience learning Russian, and let's see if we are a good fit!

pro_course_detail.title: Structured Course  0 -  B1 🏋️‍♂️ (please, click here to read the description )
pro_course_detail.description:
☑️ Pronunciation, speaking, listening, grammar, reading and vocabulary in one lesson.  
You can expect a clear step-by-step approach. 
☑️ I consider it my full responsibility to achieve​ the best results.



*    Structured means systematic📚, based on previous lessons.  So, if you are planning on taking less than 1 lesson a week, or you are more of a self- learner, perhaps you should choose Interactive Russian or Speaking Practice lessons. 

**  Because I believe the beginning stage is crucial, I meticulously work through the basics🤓. I will do this by providing a lot of practice and speaking drills until you are confident. At these lessons I don't teach intensively, but extensively🔍. 

  ***   We will definitely need video on 📹! I use Skype with video so that I can show objects, help with gestures, and correct pronunciation. Moreover, it helps in communicating🗣. For each lesson, I organize a google doc and write down all the words, so that the student can go back and review. 

 ****    Please, I suggest that you BOOK  30- OR 45-MIN SESSIONS FOR YOUR FIRST LESSON so that I can evaluate your level and we can decide on the best strategy for you.

***** First-time students! I would really appreciate if you provide some information before our first session. What have you been studying lately? Do you know the alphabet? What do you need help with? What are your goals and your favorite ways of learning? 

****** Please, reschedule according to the italki rules. I arrange my busy day carefully and value my time. Please understand!

Russian is a difficult language, but you can do it!

pro_course_detail.title: Interactive Russian for Advanced Students🤹‍♂️ (B1- C1) (please, click here to read the description )
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome! 

This is a task-based lesson, where I create a need to learn and use the language. We take the focus away from form and structures and develop your ability TO DO  things in Russian.
The main purpose of these lessons is to bring you out of your silent stagnation, give you confidence and fluency. Here you are going to apply what you have learned in a very natural way. These lessons are for self- learners, whom I greatly respect, who would like to activate their passive knowledge.  You must have at least B1 level.

           #  Let me know what you have been studying lately and I will organize smth interesting for you
           #  I will use videos, media, presentations and conversation practice as the main backbone of the lesson.
            # I will also arrange a great variety of interactive and task-based lessons where I try to make you speak spontaneously: 

       *  You will visit a Russian restaurant with me and order a meal.
       * You will check in a hotel. 
       * Let’s do some shopping together!
       * Make yourself at home in my kitchen. Let's cook together! I know some gooood         recipes 
       * Help me clean the house 
And many - more...​ 

# You will retell stories, act out conversations, give presentations, solve different tasks.

#   Please, reschedule according to the italki rules. I MIGHT RESCHEDULE if you miss, but
 I MIGHT NOT, especially if I got up at 4 a.m. or I declined my friend's invitation for dinner. Please understand.

See you!

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking practice. 🗣 A1 - B2
pro_course_detail.description:
I understand that some people prefer to learn through a relaxed (or dynamic) , friendly but focused conversation. Perhaps YOU STUDY THE LANGUAGE YOURSELF and want to practice your speaking. These lessons are for you.

Casual conversation is great, but the focused conversation is better. 

On lower levels, learners of Russian very often lack confidence because they haven't had enough opportunities to activate their knowledge. My task here is to provide multiple speaking drills to make you use the structure many times. 

On higher levels, I will try to adjust the pace and difficulty to your level and lead the conversation according to your needs and interests in a way that we repeat new words and structures as much as possible.

 I will gently correct you if you wish so (let me know about that). If needed we will stop for a few mins. for some grammar explanation. 
If we manage to stay on one topic for 2- 3-4  sessions, that’s the best.

BUT I’m gonna need your help here).
 First - stay focused, as sometimes the topic tends to shift away.
Second - don't consider the questions I ask genuinely sincere, since you need to understand it's  SPEAKING PRACTICE. It's like a physical exercise, aimed at a particular group of muscles🏋️‍♂️. For example, if I ask how much your house costs or how much money🏦 you've got in your wallet right now, it's not because I am nosing around, but we are PRACTICING numbers.))

Thirdly, speaking can sometimes be messy, as you might have already figured out. We both need a lot of patience!!!

And finally,​ these are YOUR Speaking sessions, I expect YOU to speak a lot! Getting in the mood of speaking takes effort for some people, but it's worth it! 

Try it out!

pro_course_detail.title: VERBAL ASPECT in Russian 🧨 ( solid A1/ a2 level students)
pro_course_detail.description: I am ready to teach you the most difficult and intriguing Russian grammar - Verbal Aspect. You will find out it has nothing to do with the English Past or the Present Perfect Tense, and The Imperfective Aspect is NOT an incomplete action. You will finally tell the difference between " Я обедала" / " Я пообедала"; "Я буду есть" / " Я съем". This course will change your perception of the world around you and make you think like a Russian.

Contact for details, 
Anya

teacher_info.intro: I am a native Russian speaker from Saint Petersburg, I currently live in Italy.I offer professional lessons of Russian and Italian languages (see my programs) and Informal tutoring (conversation) in both languages.
teacher_info.introduction:
My name is Daria and I'm a native Russian speaker.

I was born in Moscow, grew up in Saint Petersburg, then moved to Germany for a year and after that to Italy where I've been living for 10 years now. So I speak Italian fluently. I also speak English, Brazilian Portuguese, some German and basic Spanish. Now I began studying French and Japanese. So, I'm a language learner myself and I can understand the difficulties you may encounter while studying a new language. I could give you some good advice in language learning, we could try using different methods in our lessons, I'm very open-minded and resourceful.

Qualifications & Experience

I have a bachelor's degree in foreign languages from the University of Rome "La Sapienza" and a master's degree in foreign languages and international communications from the University of Turin in Italy.

I've been teaching Russian and Italian on Skype for more than three years now and before that I'd had different experiences in teaching Russian language to the Italian students at my university and Italian language to Russians.

I'm also a professional translator and interpreter from Italian into Russian and back.

My students are from all over the world: Italy, Russia, USA, Brazil, Cina, Belgium, Germany etc. I've had teaching experience with students of different ages, levels and backgrounds.

Teaching Approach

I offer individual tailor-made lessons that give my students an opportunity to work on areas of particular interest or concern. Each lesson is prepared according to the student's specific needs.

During my lessons I use different tools such as videos, songs, newspaper articles, films. pro_course_detail.title: Russian for everyone. Level A1/A2 Russo per tutti. Livello A1/A2
pro_course_detail.description:
Course for complete beginners. A1
After this course you will be able to get acquainted with somebody; name your profession and occupation; inquire and give biographical information about yourself and third person; inquire and inform about the hobbies, interests; say holiday greetings (public, national or family holiday); thank, reply to the greetings; express a desire; give/accept a present; invite for the holiday, for a visit; accept an invitation/refuse an invitation, explain the reason of refusal; agree upon time and place of meeting; find out and give address, phone number; find out /give information about the locations; how to get there; whether it is far or close to go there; what is the fare, how to pay the fare; know how to use transport schedule, signs at the streets, stations, airport; tell how the excursion went off, give an appraisal of it; suggest/ accept the offer to have breakfast/ lunch/dinner/supper at the restaurant, café; refuse the offer, explain the reason of refusal; agree upon place and time of meeting; read the menu; order foods and drinks; find out/ give in-formation about favorite dishes, one's choice; pay for the lunch/dinner.
You will learn basic grammar of Russian language.

Course A2.
After this course you will be able to read various journalistic and literary descriptive or narrative texts with elements of argumentation and combined sorts of texts with a clearly expressed author's position; write plans, thesis or synopsis based on the texts you've read or heard; understand dialogues from everyday communication with clearly expressed positions of the speakers; radio news, advertising; dialogues from feature films and TV programs with clearly expressed relations between the speakers; maintain dialogue by implementing the given communication strategy; act as initiator of an interrogation dialogue; speak about what you've seen and express your own view and evaluation, analyze a topic in a free speech situation;

I will be glad to share my knowledge, skills and abilities, to raise your level of professional competence in the field of Russian philology.

Моё профильное образование - преподаватель английского. Я предлагаю курсы по изучению английского для начинающих, курсы по подготовке к ОГЭ, ЕГЭ и FCE, помогу составить индивидуальную программу изучения английского языка.

course_info.trial_description:

At the end of the lesson, I can recommend you a course on the study of the Russian language. Feel free to book a trial lesson at any time according to the schedule :-)

Давайте познакомимся! Общение с Вами на пробном уроке позволит мне определить Ваш уровень владения русским языком как иностранным (А1, А2, В1, В2, С1, С2). В конце урока я смогу рекомендовать Вам курс по изучению русского языка. Не стесняйтесь взять пробный урок в любое удобное время в соответствии с расписанием :-)

pro_course_detail.title: Individual lessons / Индивидуальные уроки / Russian lessons A1 - C2
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons we will focus on the kinds of activity:

- learning new words
- reading articles in Russian
- watching video in Russian
- how to understand the speech of native speakers of Russian
- improvement your pronunciation
- improvement grammar
- development of spoken language

See you in class!

На моих уроках Вы сможете:

- узнать новые слова
- читать статьи на русском
- смотреть видео на русском
- понимать речь носителей русского языка

До встречи на занятиях!

pro_course_detail.title: Preparation for the Test of Russian as a Foreign Language / the Russian Citizenship Test / Подготовка к Тесту по русскому языку как иностранному
pro_course_detail.description:
Preparation for passing the test in Russian as a foreign language.
- Elementary Level (TEL/A1)
- Basic Level (TBL/A2)
- First Certification Level (TORFL-I/B1)
- The 2nd Level Certificate (TORFL-II /В2)
- The 3rd Level Certificate (TORFL-III /C1)
- The 4th Level Certificate (TORFL-IV/C2)

Each test contains five parts:
– Vocabulary, grammar
– Reading
– Listening comprehension
– Writing
– Speaking.

Подготовка к сдаче экзамена ТРКИ.
ТЭУ - Тест по русскому языку как иностранному. Элементарный уровень (А1);
ТБУ - Тест по русскому языку как иностранному. Базовый уровень (А2);
ТРКИ-1 - Тест по русскому языку как иностранному. Первый сертификационный уровень (В1);
ТРКИ-2 - Тест по русскому языку как иностранному. Второй сертификационный уровень (В2);
ТРКИ-3 - Тест по русскому языку как иностранному. Третий сертификационный уровень (С1);
ТРКИ-4 - Тест по русскому языку как иностранному. Четвёртый сертификационный уровень (С2).

Уровни ТРКИ:
- Элементарный,
- Базовый,
- I сертификационный,
- II сертификационный,
- III сертификационный,
- IV сертификационный.

Пять компонентов ТРКИ:
- Лексика, грамматика
- Чтение
- Аудирование
- Письмо
- Говорение

/////

I propose a special preparation program for passing certification testing in Russian as a foreign language, Russian history and the basics of the legislation of the Russian Federation.

Я предлагаю специальную программу подготовки к сдаче сертификационного тестирования по русскому языку как иностранному, истории России и основам законодательства Российской Федерации.

pro_course_detail.title: RUSSIAN FOR KIDS & TEENS / Русский язык для детей и подростков
pro_course_detail.description: During the course your child will master speech skills, enrich vocabulary, and improve grammar. Lessons are organised in a playful way, accompanied by songs, videos and interesting tasks. I teach children from 6 years old. After the lesson, I ask parents to follow up on some simple homework assignments and encourage their child.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversational
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's speak Russian! The lesson is intended for B1 level students. Before the lesson, you will choose a topic that you would like to discuss, and I will prepare cards, videos or songs on this topic and we will discuss it together.

Давайте поговорим по-русски! Урок предназначен для студентов уровня В1. Перед уроком вы выберете тему, которую хотели бы обсудить, а я подготовлю карточки, видео или песни на эту тему и мы вместе обсудим.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian literature, history and culture
pro_course_detail.description:
Русская литература - это огромное духовное наследие. Оно несёт в себе не только историческое наследие, но и духовный нравственный стержень. Это тот камертон, который помогает правильно настроить мелодию жизни. На примере многих известных литературных произведений мы учимся правильно смотреть на жизнь, понимать других людей и себя, осознавать и оценивать свои поступки. 
Русская литература знаменита на весь мир своим психологизмом, самыми известными представители этого литературного направления являются Ф. М. Достоевский, Л.Н. Толстой, А.П. Чехов. Их произведения до сих пор изучаются литературными критиками, возникают все новые и новые интерпретации и версии анализа их творчества.
Я бесконечно люблю русскую литературу, восхищаюсь талантам и слогом русских писателей. Я буду рада поговорить пролистать с Вами страницы русской истории, литературы и искусства.

You clearly understand the purpose of learning Russian and are eager to speak Russian and understand native speakers.
- You are interested in Russian history and our lessons will be devoted to grandiose historical figures and historical events.
 - You need speaking practice in different areas.

pro_course_detail.title: Training Course on entering the University / Подготовительный курс для поступления в университет
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you going to enter the university in Russia? Will the training be in Russian? This course is for you.

The subjects of the course:
- Grammar
- Speaking
- Russian culture and history
- Russian literature

Вы планируете поступить в университет в России? Обучение будет на русском? Тогда этот курс для вас.

Предметы курса:
- Грамматика
- Разговорная речь
- Страноведение
- Русская литература

pro_course_detail.title: English for beginners / Английский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for those who have not studied English before or have studied long ago, and fragments of phrases remain in their memory.
I will help you understand English grammar, enlarge your vocabulary. You will learn basic topics: greeting people, weather, shopping, work, health, professions, etc.
We will watch and discuss videos, listen to audio, develop speaking skills.

Этот курс для тех, кто не изучал ранее английский или учил когда-то давно и в памяти остались обрывки фраз.
Я помогу понять английскую грамматику, расширить ваш словарный запас. Мы будем изучать первые основные темы: приветствие, погода, покупки, работа, здоровый образ жизни, профессии и т.д.
Мы будем смотреть видео, слушать аудио, развивать навыки разговорной речи.

pro_course_detail.description:

teacher_info.intro:
Hello!

My name is Viktoria. I am a native Russian speaker and professional linguist. I graduated from pedagogical University in Saint-Petersburg with a Bachelor of Art in music. And I've got a second diploma from Saint-Petersburg State University as english-russian interpreter.

I do love foreign languages. I can speak English, a little Italian and I have basic knowlege in German. I stadied it at school and University.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello!

My name is Viktoria. I am a native Russian speaker and professional linguist. I graduated from pedagogical University in Saint-Petersburg with a Bachelor of Art in music. And I've got a second diploma from Saint-Petersburg State University as english-russian interpreter.

I do love foreign languages. I can speak English, a little Italian and I have basic knowlege in German. I stadied it at school and University.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
In my class I pay attention to all necessary activities as 
 - speaking,
 - pronounsiation,
 - listening comprehension,
 - writing,
 - reading,
 - systematising grammar.

I focus on my student's needs and do my best to make learning process easy and fascinating.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In every lesson we will pay attention to new verbs, because without verbs you can't speak properly. It is the base of the sentence. Russian verb's grammar is not difficult ;) It has only 3 tenses.
Reading Russian isn't as difficult as Chinese, French or English. I think we start read some short words on our first lesson.
And one of my teaching concept is that learning new words without context is absolutely waist of time. At least you need to learn phrases. Every language has atmosphere and logic and if you feel and understand it you will be successful. It's my humble opinion.

course_info.trial_description:
A trial lesson lets us meet and get to know each other better before you commit to our working together. Compatibility between a teacher and student is the most important element in making progress in your Russian conversation.

These lessons will be more of a friendly introduction. I will be asking you some general questions to get to know you and understand your Russian level and goals. We'll discuss what you need help with and how I can help you as your tutor.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice - Learning by Speaking!
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversation practice is a great way of transforming theoretical knowledge of a language into practical verbal skills you can use in day to day life!  

In these lessons we will be focusing on strengthening your speaking skills.  We will discuss any topic that you want. While we talk, I will be listening out for your strengths and areas where you may need more practice, and I'll make notes that we will discuss during or near the end of the lesson. All notes (new words, phrases, grammar constructions) will be sent to you after our lesson.

If you have something specific you are preparing for we can tailor the lesson to a more situation based conversation. Please let me know this beforehand :)

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons we can learn and practice:

- Listening
- Reading 
- Grammar 
- Speaking
- Vocabulary
- Functional Russian
- Phrasal Verbs
- Idioms
- Pronunciation

I will provide learning materials based on whichever skill you want to learn/ practice. Materials may include presentations, news articles and videos, dialogues, stories, pronunciation and grammar exercises, etc. I'm also very happy to use any materials you would prefer to use. You will be sent lesson materials and notes after our class.

teacher_info.intro: Ladies and gentlemen! My dears! Welcome to Demi's world, the place that shines brightly on the artistic horizon. My dears, there is a place for everyone who is eager to improve their linguistic ability through a theatrical approach or simply keep improving their communicative skills. I am 29 at the moment and my major interests are Language, Myth, and Culture. I am a whole-soul admirer of theatre, cinematography, literature, poetry, and fine arts. The main thing for me is questioning and that's where we start from. I have never stopped examining my experiences and sharing with them since it's an important part of language acquisition. I dwell on the small space between tragedy and comedy.
teacher_info.short_signature: Just a chap who by means of theater creates a space for you to learn and practice a language
teacher_info.introduction: Ahoy hoy! If you are reading this, it means that something drew you attention. I am very glad to know that. I come from that what is called philosophical background, which is very unclear to some extent. And some philosophical observations led me to the phenomena of language. It was the time when I started to be interested in different languages. In this case, I would say that linguistics and philosophy are neighbours. The most important thing in case of learning a foreign language is a reflection upon it, consequently it becomes not a simple learning, but a discovery, first of all discovery of yourself. I have to say that I have been teaching English for 2,5 years so far and I have been learning other languages at the same time. I finally found that what I appreciate and totally adore. I have been in those uncomfortable but dynamic situations ( I mean the struggle inside the language) so many times and now I can understand the mechanisms of it. It made my progress faster and more interesting, since I found what works for me. I want you to find the same for you, dear reader.  So here and now I would like to invite you into the wonderland of language and march with me through different obstacles and vicissitudes that the language brings us daily. Dear boys and girls! I'd be delighted to work with you and spend quality time together. At the moment I can work with three language and it seems already as an achievement for me, but there are new horizons that are waiting for us. I would like to offer you my helping hand in case of previously mentioned languages. And the main thing that I work on is actual speaking of the language, so I create those magical conditions for you to feel the freedom of speaking with the variety of methods. Ad fontes! I look forward to hearing from you Cordially yours, Demi
teacher_info.about_me: Ladies and gentlemen! My dears! Welcome to Demi's world, the place that shines brightly on the artistic horizon. My dears, there is a place for everyone who is eager to improve their linguistic ability through a theatrical approach or simply keep improving their communicative skills. I am 29 at the moment and my major interests are Language, Myth, and Culture. I am a whole-soul admirer of theatre, cinematography, literature, poetry, and fine arts. The main thing for me is questioning and that's where we start from. I have never stopped examining my experiences and sharing with them since it's an important part of language acquisition. I dwell on the small space between tragedy and comedy.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Teaching is a brutal field as far as we know. However, that is already a reason to take a risk and immerse yourself right to it. I started to teach back in 2014 right after I got my philosophical degree and my eyes sparkled up with the brightest ideas on how I can develop my performing skills and be the most of use for my disciples. I taught in a couple of countries all over the world, educating different age groups. It's always been challenging, albeit I am always willing to improve.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are just like the flow of the river, like a good novel that takes you on a life adventure and grasps your attention towards details. I totally adore working with improvisation and surrealism, imagination, and spontaneity. This is the core of the language for me. It is a poetic approach towards the language and its usage in your life, it is living the language and living in the language that allows you to describe this enigmatic world around you. During our classes, I am a midwife that helps you to give birth to a Thought and to a Word with which the thought is described. I also use a lot of theatrical exercises in order to train your imagination and stir up your curiosity.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: The cancellation policy is 24 hours before the class

edu_info.institution: Lviv National University of Ivan Franko

teacher_child_tag.full_name: Test of English as a Foreign Language

course_info.trial_description: This is a trial class where we will try to identify your position on the language coordinates in order to know how we could move further. It is a chance to find out more about each other and our psychological features that are very important in case of language learning. The same as your goals, ambitions and motivation. I will tell you more about my methods and strategy that I will develop specifically for your needs. I always make it personal, so you could feel the efficiency in no time. I promise to make it interactive =) Look forward to talking to you.

pro_course_detail.title: English Language
pro_course_detail.description: During these classes, we will try to work on every part of the language in an improvisational way and learn the language through the conversation not missing the integrity. I use a question-answer approach along with other theatrical approaches, simulating situations, storytelling techniques and role-plays to understand the language and use it efficiently in the conversation, in the most natural and organic way. =)

pro_course_detail.title: Poetry Recitation
pro_course_detail.description: This is a course of poetry recitation where you have a chance to try yourself in reading English poetry and even interpret it. Poetry is a gateway to understanding the language and its depth.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language/Русский язык

During these classes, we will try to work on every part of the language in an improvisational way and learn the language through the conversation not missing the integrity. I use a question-answer approach along with other theatrical approaches, simulating situations, storytelling techniques and role-plays to understand the language and use it efficiently in the conversation, in the most natural and organic way. =)

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS/TOEFL preparation course
pro_course_detail.description: It is a IELTS/TOEFL preparation course where you will have a chance to get to know some great piece of advice and how to get a desirable score while practising it in a friendly atmosphere.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian language/Українська мова
pro_course_detail.description: This is a course of conversational Ukrainian where you have a chance to improve your speaking and communicative skills the same as grammar and writing. During these classes, we will try to work on every part of the language in an improvisational way and learn the language through the conversation not missing the integrity. I use a question-answer approach along with other theatrical approaches, simulating situations, storytelling techniques and role-plays to understand the language and use it efficiently in the conversation, in the most natural and organic way. =)

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description: This is a business English course where we will be discussing a variety of topics in professional use. The place to gain your corporate experience, and build up confidence in your career. I use simulating situations and acting skills in order to reach a successful result during the meetings, negotiations, passing the job interview or presentation delivery. Since I use it as a sample, it will be useful for every area and industry.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Literature and Poetry / Русская литература и поэзия
pro_course_detail.description: This is a course of poetical reading where you have a chance to try yourself in reading Russian poetry and literature and even interpret it. Poetry and literature are the gateways to understanding the langauge and its depth.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian Literature and Poetry / Українська література та поезія
pro_course_detail.description: This is a course of poetical reading where you have a chance to try yourself in reading Russian poetry and literature and even interpret it. Poetry and literature are the gateways to understanding the langauge and its depth.

pro_course_detail.title: English for children
pro_course_detail.description: A wonderful chance to open up the world of the foreign language for a child or a teenager. I deliver these lessons in a playful and frisky manner, just like children themselves. Certainly one of my favourite audience. I create various situations for them, so they can challenge their imagination. I always try to make it personal and allow the child to get out of the comfort zone in order to use the language in the most natural way. Since children are the best actors it is also important to work with the emotional level while learning a foreign language and that is something that I adore doing during the lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Western Literature
pro_course_detail.description: The course is based on English and American literary tradition. Here we discuss the major the same as minor works and authors of both traditions. We try to interpret what we read and to comprehend the dimension of literature and its relation to one's life.

pro_course_detail.title: Западная Литература
pro_course_detail.description: Курс основан на английских и американских литературных традициях. Здесь мы обсуждаем основные, а также второстепенные произведения и авторов обеих традиций. Мы пытаемся интерпретировать то, что читаем, и осмыслить измерение литературы и ее отношение к жизни.

pro_course_detail.title: Західна Література
pro_course_detail.description: Курс базується на англійській та американській літературних традиціях. Тут ми обговорюємо основні, як і другорядні твори, і авторів обох традицій. Ми намагаємось інтерпретувати прочитане та зрозуміти вимір літератури та її відношення до свого життя.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, my name is Asya and I am a translator, linguist and teacher. I was born in Russia and I love the Russian language very much. In my free time I like to learn something new, communicate with people and study. I like to study the language, its features and teaching methods. I also do volunteering, and participate in international projects, they help me to bring something good to this world, travel and find new people. 
My favorite quote: "Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow on it" - Vincent Van Gogh
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, my name is Asya and I am a translator, linguist and teacher. I was born in Russia and I love the Russian language very much. In my free time I like to learn something new, communicate with people and study. I like to study the language, its features and teaching methods. I also do volunteering, and participate in international projects, they help me to bring something good to this world, travel and find new people. 
My favorite quote: "Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow on it" - Vincent Van Gogh
teacher_info.about_teacher: At first, when I was a student in linguistics I taught French as a personal tutor, then teaching turned into a profession. I started teaching Russian several years ago, when I worked on foreign cruises, then I decided to study various methods of teaching myself. And finally, I got my masters degree in teaching Russian as a foreign language. I had an experience with all levels - from zero to advanced and business Russian. I besides my personal tutoring l had an experience of teaching in Pennsylvanian college (the USA), Pushkin institute  (Moscow) and Higher School of Economics (Moscow).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I love communicative and TBLT techniques. We should not forget that the language is alive, so communication and authentic materials - movies, TV series, books, etc. are so important during our learning procces. I always build a lesson in such a way that it is interesting and practical. My students, who come to me for the first time, start talking already at the first lesson. 
As a native speaker and a linguist, I will be able to help you understand the most difficult issues of the language.

exp_info.company: Институт русского языка им. А.С. Пушкина

edu_info.major: Русский язык во взаимодействии языков и культур

course_info.trial_description:
Let's start practicing!
During the trial lesson we will meet each other, discuss your goals and preferences.
Then we will discuss some interesting topics, get to know some new words or play a little game. It will depend on your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Real Spoken Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
During the lesson we will:
-Speak only Russian 
-Learn how to speak like real Russian  
-Speak on topics suitable for your level, and interests
-Discuss Russian traditions and modern life 
-Use authentic materials: films, clips, cartoons (my favourite), books

pro_course_detail.title: Total beginners and exam preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
We are going to:
- Prepare for tests and exams in the Russian language
- Practice grammar 
- Learn how to write different types of text: short stories, letters, reviews etc.
- Learn how to read and understand

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language and culture through books and films
pro_course_detail.description:
We are going to:
- Learn grammar and new words trough Russian cinema and literature
- Understand spoken Russian
- Discuss modern movies and books in Russian 
- Prepare you to the trip to Russia (if you wish)

teacher_info.intro: Здравствуйте меня зовут Вера. В настоящее время я живу в городе Калининград. Ранее мне довелось пожить в разных частях России (от Юга до Дальнего Востока), поэтому могу рассказать вам о разных стилях жизни! У меня есть двое прекрасных деток, с которыми я очень люблю проводить время. Старший сын - учится в 4 классе , я ему помогаю выполнять домашнее задание, особенно мы любим русский язык! Младшему сыну 5 лет, он уже бегло читает и умеет писать, буквы мы начали изучать уже в двух летнем возрасте. Вместе мы много читаем, чтение помогает не только в увеличении словарного запаса, но и повышает нашу общую грамотность.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Я как преподаватель занималась с  учеником, это был мой друг - француз. На наших уроках всегда было весело, интересно, я задавала ему домашние задания. Сейчас мы с ним свободно общаемся на русском,  чему я конечно очень рада) Моя цель - сделать так, чтобы вам было комфортно говорить по-русски, поэтому я буду поддерживать дружескую атмосферу, но всегда буду следить за тем, чтобы вы как можно больше говорили по-русски.
teacher_info.teaching_style: На своих уроках использую самые лучшие материалы и проверенные временем методики. Уроки проходят непринужденно, весело (при необходимости в игровой форме) с обязательным домашним заданием. Несмотря на то, что я ценю веселье во время обучения, к каждому занятию готовлюсь тщательно. Вы можете рассчитывать на индивидуальный урок, полностью основанный на ваших потребностях и предпочтениях.

course_info.trial_description: Здравствуйте меня зовут Вера. Я преподаватель русского языка, на своих уроках я использую только самые лучшие материалы. Уроки проходят весело с домашним заданием, обратной связи. Пожалуйста пишите)
